mention.text: 9 nov 89 -- the government of president alfredo cristiani
the government of president alfredo cristiani

a commission that will be composed of representatives from the united nations , the oas , cedes , political parties , labor union organizations -- including one from fenastras -- dr ignacio ellacuria , the prosecuting attorney 's office , and the justice minister
the government communique states that the fenastras refusal to participate in the commission
the judicial process , '' the official government communique states
the judicial process that has already begun
something to report that would help clarify this regrettable incident
